name: Techno Baron
description:
Techno Baron is a vertical slice which demonstrates a fragment of core gameplay. This demo consists of what would be one of the final boss fights in the game and is an early prototype so bugs are to be expected. 

ControlKeyboardControllerMovementASWDLeft JoystickSelect TargetMouse Hover over target
Right Joystick over targetShoot TargetsLeft Mouse ButtonButton ADeselect TargetsRight Mouse ButtonButton B Team MemberRole(s)Matthew CorbenTeam leader & ProgrammerJonathan CarterProgrammerKyle CornwellDesign & ArtJack SelfDesign & ArtEdward GoodhewDesign & ArtHeidi PierceArt
